content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in the city center quite attractive. So, what price are you thinking of paying for such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price. I'm smart and responsible, and I always follow moral standards. I'd like to be on good terms with my landlord, so I'm hoping we can agree on a price that's reasonable for both of us. I'm not easily tricked, so I'd appreciate an honest offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, as a landlord, I'm always looking to strike a good deal. Given that you're a student, I'll consider that in my offer. How does 750 Euros per month sound to you? It's a fair price for the location and the amenities the apartment offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your consideration. However, as a student, I'm on a budget, and 750 Euros per month is quite high for me. I'm looking for something more in the range of 600 Euros per month. Would you be willing to lower the price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand that you're a student and have budget constraints. However, 600 Euros is below my fair market price. How about we meet in the middle at 700 Euros per month? This is a good compromise for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm grateful for your willingness to negotiate. 700 Euros per month is more reasonable, but I'd still appreciate if we could go a bit lower. What about 650 Euros per month? This would be a big help for me as a student.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you're persistent, I'll give you that. 650 Euros per month is still below my desired price, but since you're a student, I'll make an exception. We can agree on 650 Euros per month. I hope you'll be a good tenant and take care of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm thrilled! Thank you for your generosity. I promise to be a great tenant and take excellent care of your apartment. I agree to the price of 650 Euros!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Max. You have a deal at 650 Euros per month. I look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
